title: "Accomplished University of Ottawa professors earn Canada Research Chairs"
excerpt: "The University of Ottawa has been awarded four new Canada Research Chairs (CRC) that will strengthen its expertise in artificial intelligence, health and law, plus the renewal of two CRCs that will conduct leading-edge research in quantum communications and photonics."
